reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress elegant and flattering, with one noting its stunning black appearance.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, flattering fit
items.body: Beautiful, comfortable with slight stretch. Got so many compliments from wedding guests. Read more
items.author: Shelly M.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Elegant dress
items.body: Liked very much Elegant Read more
items.author: Brenda Scott

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: I absolutely loved this dress. It was Beautiful and so comfortable. Great dress and a great price. Read more
items.author: Penny Purser

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thank you for for saving the mother of the groom
items.body: The media could not be loaded. The dress is stunning,Although this was not the original color that I requested, everything worked out very very well!! The dress is flattering, comfortable, and especially wrinkle resistant to travel as well. Read more
items.author: AlliT

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering Formal Gown
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Just got my new dress and I'm super happy with it! The satin material feels so luxurious and the ruffle design is really chic. The length is perfect for a night out and the split in the front adds a nice touch of elegance. Can't wait to wear it to my next event! Read more
items.author: Nina Natsvlishvili

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit and comfortable
items.body: Comfortable and fit exactly what it says. Read more
items.author: Sarah and Tony

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars great experience
items.body: I ordered a custom made dress. I ordered custom made because I am very short and to get the gown shortened to my height was quite expensive. I was pleasantly surprised upon receiving my dress. It fit perfectly and the length was exact! The dress was well made and is exactly as I wanted.I am looking forward to wearing my dress at my son,s wedding in July. Read more
items.author: Nilza Fujiyama

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect
items.body: I ordered a custom size dress. I received it yesterday and I was afraid to try it on. I tried it this morning and it fit perfectly. Read more
items.author: AUGUSTO VIDAL BRESSANELLI

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Formal Evening Mermaid is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Formal Evening Mermaid is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Hunter Green, Brown, Olive Green, Fuchsia, Dusty Pink, Black, Champagne, Peacock, Plum, Blush Pink, Lavender, Royal Blue, Teal, Turquoise. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
